sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import EmployeeService from '../services/EmployeeService'; import jsPDF from 'jspdf'; import 'jspdf-autotable'; const ViewEmployeeFinanceComponent = () => { const [employeeDetails, setEmployeeDetails] = useState({}); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { EmployeeService.getEmployeeById(id).then((response) => { setEmployeeDetails(response.data); }).catch(error => { console.log(error); }); }, [id]); const generatePDF = () => { const doc = new jsPDF(); doc.setFontSize(16); doc.text("Employee Finance Details", 10, 10); const details = [ { label: "Employee Name", value: `${employeeDetails.employeeFirstName} ${employeeDetails.employeeLastName}` }, { label: "Employee Code", value: employeeDetails.employeeCode }, { label: "PAN", value: employeeDetails.panCardNumber }, { label: "Aadhar", value: employeeDetails.aadharCardNumber }, { label: "Bank Name", value: employeeDetails.bankName }, { label: "IFSC Code", value: employeeDetails.ifscCode }, { label: "Bank Branch", value: employeeDetails.bankBranch }, { label: "Basic Salary", value: employeeDetails.basicSalary }, { label: "Bonus", value: employeeDetails.bonus }, { label: "House Rent Allowance", value: employeeDetails.houseRentAllowance }, { label: "Medical Allowance", value: employeeDetails.medicalAllowance }, { label: "Travel Allowance", value: employeeDetails.travelAllowance }, { label: "PF", value: employeeDetails.pf }, { label: "Tax", value: employeeDetails.tax }, { label: "CTC", value: employeeDetails.ctc }, ]; details.forEach((detail, index) => { doc.text(`${detail.label}: ${detail.value}`, 10, 20 + (index * 10)); }); doc.save(`${employeeDetails.employeeFirstName}_${employeeDetails.employeeLastName}_FinanceDetails.pdf`); }; return (

{`${employeeDetails.employeeFirstName} ${employeeDetails.employeeLastName}`}

Personal Information

Employee ID {id}
First Name {employeeDetails.employeeFirstName}
Last Name {employeeDetails.employeeLastName}
Employee Code {employeeDetails.employeeCode}
PAN {employeeDetails.panCardNumber}
Aadhar {employeeDetails.aadharCardNumber}

Bank Details

Bank Name {employeeDetails.bankName}
IFSC Code {employeeDetails.ifscCode}
Bank Branch {employeeDetails.bankBranch}

Salary Details

Basic Salary {employeeDetails.basicSalary}
Bonus {employeeDetails.bonus}
House Rent Allowance {employeeDetails.houseRentAllowance}
Medical Allowance {employeeDetails.medicalAllowance}
Travel Allowance {employeeDetails.travelAllowance}
PF {employeeDetails.pf}
Tax {employeeDetails.tax}
CTC {employeeDetails.ctc}
); }; export default ViewEmployeeFinanceComponent;
